content: *this adorable amigurumi turkey is sure to brighten up your thanksgiving feast lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80744ad skill level easy vanna s choice® article #860 4 colors 1 ball each *chocolate mustard cranberry honey* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 6 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing worked in continuous rounds some construction required to finish
